page.title: 13SPORTS IN THE AREA
page.content:
{ SURVEY OF ACTIVE SPORTS IN THE AREA}
Fathers Mothers Children
1 Tennis Tennis Football 8.6 12.3 40.7 %
2 Football Badmtn Cricket 4.9 4.9 23.5 %
3 Jogging Jogging Tennis 4.9 2.5 19.8 %
In Baslow, the Recreation Ground contains a football pitch, cricket pitch and 2 tennis courts. The primary school uses the ground for football and hockey in winter, and rounders, cricket, softball and athletics in the summer. A nearby practice football pitch is used. Several pavilions have changing facilities.
